did.unittitle: Shelter Island Meeting House Committee petition and subscription list
did.abstract: A copy of a petition and subscription list requesting donations to erect a new meeting house on Shelter Island. The list was only signed by two people, Benjamin and Gilbert Horton. The committee consisted of five men: Sylvester Dering, Samuel Lord, William Bavditch, Jonathan Douglass, and Henry Conklin.
